data.actual_result: the red notification is present when you come back from the multitasking into the discord app.
data.expected_result: After viewing the message, the red notification should be gone when you multitask and come  back into the app.
data.short_description: When someone sends a dm while you are talking to them, then quickly switch to a server and use multitask to get into a different app, when you get back it still shows that you have a dm notification from the user who sent the message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Someone sends you a dm while you are viewing the conversation and switch to a server. - Step 2: open multitasking and switch to another app like chrome. - Step 3: Get back into discord via multitasking and you will still see a DM notification  that should have been gone by then.
